title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 with respect to voluntary early retirement benefits and medical benefits.
content: Teacher Voluntary Early Retirement Incentive Act of 2001 - Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to provide that, subject to specified conditions, such Act is not violated if: (1) voluntary early retirement incentive plans (VERIPs), for employees of local educational agencies (LEAs) or institutions of higher education, reduce or eliminate supplemental benefits on the basis of the employee's age at retirement under certain conditions. Or (2) retiree medical benefits of an employee benefit plan are coordinated with Medicare or State employee benefit plans.
